instructions.label: A
instructions.caption: Rate truthfulness from 1 (definitely false) to 10 (definitely true).
instructions.text:
Judge the claim using only the information provided in this task. Consider the full context of the element. Do not search externally.

  • 1–2: clearly false
  • 3–4: probably false
  • 5–6: unclear or mixed evidence
  • 7–8: probably true
  • 9–10: clearly true

If uncertain, choose the closest value.

mapping.label: Agree
mapping.description: General agreement; minor reservations at most.

mapping.label: Undecided
mapping.description: Neither agree nor disagree, or insufficient basis to decide.

mapping.label: Disagree
mapping.description: General disagreement; minor reservations at most.

instructions.label: B
instructions.caption: Indicate your level of agreement with the statement.
instructions.text:
Select one option that best reflects your view of the statement based on the content provided. Do not use external sources.

  • Choose the closest option if unsure.
  • Use “Undecided” only when you are genuinely neutral or lack sufficient information.
